title: New: GEMS – Ephemera
body:
DC duo **GEMS** release their highly anticipated debut EP today, and are now streaming the final track to be lifted from the four track record.

_Ephemera_, a word derived from ancient Greek, meaning something not intended to be preserved, and only existing for a short period of time, quite commonly referring to insects or flowers with short life spans, is yet another step up for Lindsay Pitts and Clifford Usher, whilst showing a more reserved, narrative driven element to **GEMS**. Check out _Ephemera_ below, and pick up the EP on [iTunes](https://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/medusa-ep/id734662304), or below, via Bandcamp.
